title: HMCL启动1.14不行 求大佬解答
author: 苏心。
txt_content:
Exception in thread "Client thread" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread
        at java.lang.Thread.start0(Native Method)
        at java.lang.Thread.start(Unknown Source)

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
内存不足，在hmcl的设置中调大

另外，记得使用最新版

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-142335-1-1.html

replies.author: 钱学森

replies.author: 1a2s3d4f1
replies.txt_content:
钱学森 发表于 2018-12-14 17:45
Exception in thread "Client thread" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread   ...
如果电脑内存不够分配1024mb可以加内存条，不行就换电脑

replies.author: Me龙星
replies.txt_content: HMCL换一个2.7的或者3.1的实在不行把运行内存调低点
